item.description:
How about trying a dinner on Block Island... leave FIT around 5:30, 2 hrs to get into town, eat and get back... should be back by at FIT about 9:30. Maybe even run a couple of approaches into ORH on the way back....
If the weather is good this is a fun flight!

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Dinner on the Block?
